remarks: A function is zero outside its support.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
suppssr.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
suppssr.n $e |- ( ph -> ( F supp Z ) C_ W ) $.
suppssr.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
suppssr.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. U ) $.
suppssr $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. ( A \ W ) ) -> ( F ` X ) = Z ) $.
